question: Which city organized the 2nd International Conference on Sustainable Water Management?
explanation: The 2nd International Conference on Sustainable Water Management was held in Pune 6â€“8 November 2019. The Conference will provide an interactive platform for brainstorming and sharing new ideas and case studies with respect to flood and drought management, hydrology, e-flows, inter-basin water transfers, climate change, intelligent decision support systems, storage projects, etc. to address the pressing issues of sustainable water resources management.
